title: The Enchanted Garden
description: Discover magical flowers and friendly creatures in an enchanted garden!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒ¸ Welcome to the Enchanted Garden!
storySteps.text: Hello little explorer! I am Petal the magical flower, and I'm so happy you're here! Today, we're going on a special listening adventure through my enchanted garden. You will meet talking flowers, singing bees, and wise butterflies. Your mission is to listen very carefully to what they say, and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready? Let's begin our magical journey together!

storySteps.title: ğŸ Singing Bees
storySteps.audioText: We work together to make honey
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the bees are singing!
storySteps.question: What do the bees do together?
storySteps.hint: Think about what bees create when they work as a team

choices.text: We work together to make honey

storySteps.revealText: Wonderful! The bees are singing about working together to make sweet honey! They show us that when we help each other, we can create something beautiful!

storySteps.title: ğŸ¦‹ Wise Butterfly
storySteps.audioText: Every flower has its own special color
storySteps.question: What does the wise butterfly tell us about flowers?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes each flower unique

choices.text: Every flower has its own special color

storySteps.revealText: Amazing! The butterfly teaches us that every flower is special in its own way, just like you! Each one has its own beautiful color and brings joy to the garden!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒˆ Magical Rainbow
storySteps.audioText: Rainbows appear after the rain brings new life
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the rainbow's magical message!
storySteps.question: When do rainbows appear according to the garden?
storySteps.hint: Think about what happens after rain

choices.text: Rainbows appear after the rain brings new life

storySteps.revealText: Perfect! Rainbows appear after rain, bringing new life and color to our garden! They remind us that beautiful things can come after challenges!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Garden Magic
storySteps.text: The garden is filled with so much magic! All the flowers and creatures are happy because you listened so carefully to their messages. You have learned so much about working together, being unique, and finding beauty in nature!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Garden Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations superstar! The WHOLE garden is celebrating YOU! Flowers are dancing, bees are buzzing with joy, and magic sparkles everywhere! You made the garden happy with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!

title: Dragon's Treasure
description: Help a friendly dragon protect its treasure from sneaky thieves!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to Dragon's Lair!
storySteps.text: Hello brave friend! I am Spark the friendly dragon, and I need your help! My treasure is being watched by sneaky thieves, and I need a smart listener like you to help protect it. You will meet wise guardians, clever puzzles, and magical keys. Your mission is to listen very carefully and answer questions to collect THREE magic stars! Are you ready for this adventure?

storySteps.title: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Wise Guardian
storySteps.audioText: Protection means keeping safe what we care about
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to the guardian's important message!
storySteps.question: What does protection mean according to the guardian?
storySteps.hint: Think about what protection is really about

choices.text: Protection means keeping safe what we care about

storySteps.revealText: Excellent! Protection is about keeping safe what we care about, not about fighting. The guardian teaches us that true protection comes from wisdom and care!

storySteps.title: ğŸ—ï¸ Magical Keys
storySteps.audioText: Keys unlock doors when we use them with kindness
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the keys tell us!
storySteps.question: How do keys unlock doors according to the magic?
storySteps.hint: Think about what makes keys work

choices.text: Keys unlock doors when we force them
Keys unlock doors when we use them with kindness
Keys unlock doors only at night

storySteps.revealText: Wonderful! The magical keys teach us that kindness is the true power that unlocks doors! When we are kind, we can open any door in our hearts!

storySteps.title: ğŸ’ Treasure Chest
storySteps.audioText: True treasure is friendship and helping others
storySteps.audioInstruction: Listen to what the treasure chest reveals!
storySteps.question: What is the true treasure according to the chest?
storySteps.hint: Think about what really matters most

choices.text: True treasure is gold and jewels
True treasure is friendship and helping others

storySteps.revealText: Perfect! The treasure chest reveals that true treasure is friendship and helping others! That's the most valuable treasure of all!

storySteps.title: ğŸŒŸ Dragon's Wisdom
storySteps.text: The dragon's lair is filled with so much wisdom! All the guardians and treasures are safe because you listened so carefully. You have learned so much about protection, kindness, and true friendship!

storySteps.title: ğŸ‰ Dragon Celebration!
storySteps.text: Congratulations hero! The friendly dragon is celebrating YOU! The treasure is safe, the guardians are happy, and magic sparkles everywhere! You protected the treasure with your wonderful listening! You should feel SO proud! Give yourself a BIG clap!
